com.crawljax.util

Class XPathHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.crawljax.util.XPathHelper

  • public final class XPathHelper
extends Object
    Utility class that contains methods used by Crawljax and some plugin to deal with XPath resolving, constructing etc.

    • Method Detail

      • getXPathExpression

        public static String getXPathExpression(Node node)
        Reverse Engineers an XPath Expression of a given Node in the DOM.
        Parameters:
        node - the given node.
        Returns:
        string xpath expression (e.g., "/html[1]/body[1]/div[3]").

      • getSiblings

        public static List<Node> getSiblings(Node parent,
                     Node element)
        Get siblings of the same type as element from parent.
        Parameters:
        parent - parent node.
        element - element.
        Returns:
        List of sibling (from element) under parent

      • evaluateXpathExpression

        public static NodeList evaluateXpathExpression(String domStr,
                               String xpathExpr)
                                        throws XPathExpressionException,
                                               IOException
        Returns the list of nodes which match the expression xpathExpr in the String domStr.
        Returns:
        the list of nodes which match the query
        Throws:
        XPathExpressionException
        IOException

      • evaluateXpathExpression

        public static NodeList evaluateXpathExpression(Document dom,
                               String xpathExpr)
                                        throws XPathExpressionException
        Returns the list of nodes which match the expression xpathExpr in the Document dom.
        Parameters:
        dom - the Document to search in
        xpathExpr - the xpath query
        Returns:
        the list of nodes which match the query
        Throws:
        XPathExpressionException - On error.

      • getXpathForXPathExpressions

        public static com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList<String> getXpathForXPathExpressions(Document dom,
                                                                          String xpathExpression)
                                                                                   throws XPathExpressionException
        Returns the XPaths of all nodes retrieved by xpathExpression. Example: //DIV[@id='foo'] returns /HTM[1]/BODY[1]/DIV[2]
        Parameters:
        dom - The dom.
        xpathExpression - The expression to find the element.
        Returns:
        list of XPaths retrieved by xpathExpression.
        Throws:
        XPathExpressionException

      • formatXPath

        public static String formatXPath(String xpath)
        Parameters:
        xpath - The xpath to format.
        Returns:
        formatted xpath with tag names in uppercase and attributes in lowercase

      • getLastElementXPath

        public static String getLastElementXPath(String xpath)
        Parameters:
        xpath - The xpath expression to find the last element of.
        Returns:
        returns the last element in the xpath expression

      • getXPathLocation

        public static int getXPathLocation(String dom,
                   String xpath)
        returns position of xpath element which match the expression xpath in the String dom.
        Parameters:
        dom - the Document to search in
        xpath - the xpath query
        Returns:
        position of xpath element, if fails returns -1

      • getCloseElementLocation

        public static int getCloseElementLocation(String dom,
                          int pos,
                          String element)
        Parameters:
        dom - The dom string.
        pos - Position where to start searching.
        element - The element.
        Returns:
        the position where the close element is

      • getCloseElementLocation

        public static int getCloseElementLocation(String dom,
                          String xpath)
        Parameters:
        dom - The dom.
        xpath - The xpath expression.
        Returns:
        the position where the close element is

      • stripXPathToElement

        public static String stripXPathToElement(String xpath)
        Parameters:
        xpath - The xpath expression.
        Returns:
        the xpath expression for only the element location. Leaves out the attributes and text()
